option.name: updatedContent
updatedContent
updatedContent
updatedContent
updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:paddingTop="8dp" android:paddingBottom="8dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/review_user_avatar" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:src="@android:drawable/sym_action_chat" app:tint="@android:color/darker_gray" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/review_author" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@android:color/black" android:textSize="16sp" android:text="Author Name" /> </LinearLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/review_comment" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="48dp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:textColor="@android:color/black" android:textSize="14sp" android:text="This is a sample review comment text." />
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/review_star_rating_layout" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="48dp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:orientation="horizontal">
<!-- Stars will be added programmatically here -->
<TextView android:id="@+id/review_rating_value" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="4dp" android:textColor="@android:color/black" android:textSize="12sp" android:text="3.0" /> </LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
